item.title: Properties
item.description: Sometimes people want to store data in variables/properties. It is not necessarily needed for FBP, when the components you are using are designed appropriately. But it is not a problem to wire the payload of an event (e.details) to a property. Storing event-data to properties To store data from an event (event.detail) just use the @-event=”((property))” syntax. You have to use two brackets because the [ and the { are used in polymer itself.
